title: Smart Data Models - MachineLearning / Generative AI Model

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `GenerativeAIModel`.

softwareVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The software version of this device

modelSize.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'.Amount of parameters of the model

windowSize.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Size of the window context of the model

documentation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. A link to model's documentation

datePublished.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. Date when the model was published
